title: EOD Update
text:
Nov 12
• Weekly meet attendance tracking done
• Tried out the questionnaires for Niram and made changes
• Raised an issue for adding sort option in items (inventory) #14302
• Meet w Pallium
• Attended weekly DPG meet
• Offboarded a full stack intern
• Few huddles w @U08PN8QTCMN regarding patient data upload
Next
• Pallium deployment

title: EOD Update
text:
Nov 13
• Reviewed the feedback form of interns and updated the tracker
• Questionnaires and tags for Niram were made
• Documentation interns were given a new task-reviewed one and gave it to Sam
• Raised an issue related to tags- #14320
• Updated the remaining activity definitions of SSMM
• New task was assigned to medical interns regarding activity definitions
• Raised an issue related to patient tag- #14325
• Few calls w Niram coordinator
Next

• Conclude the remaining activity definitions
